bug.author: saachigopal
bug.description:
[Enter feedback here] The remarks under the build_local() method have a typo - they should say "To build a docker image set useDocker=True. To push a result image into AzureML workspace container registry after image build completion set pushImageToWorkspaceAcr=True" <denchmark-h:hr></denchmark-h>
